dialogStrings:
“Because of them…ugh
my husband got into that accident…
He used to be such a strong man…”

“Is Meteor really going to
crash down on us?”{PAUSE}“I'm still too young…
I'll never remarry.”

“This memento is
all I have left of my husband…
I'll give it to you
if you'll please stop Meteor…”

“How am I supposed to continue living
in a town that lost everything?”{PAUSE}“To hell with the Mako reactor!”

“The town is in shambles…
and Meteor is coming our way…”

“All we have left is
our love for each other.”

“I don't want to die,
but who can stop Meteor?”
